flawed_nl_solution:
On a regular day it would take 3*12=<<3*12=36>>36 minutes
With the leak it will take 5*12=<<5*12=60>>60 minutes
It will take 60-36=<<60-36=42>>42 more minutes if the leak goes undetected
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
